H0.text: What controversial relic went on display in 2010 in the Italian city whose name it bears. Shroud of Turin

H1.text: What controversial relic went on display in 2010 in the Italian city whose name it bears. Veil of Veronica

H2.text: What controversial relic went on display in 2010 in the Italian city whose name it bears. Sudarium of Oviedo

H3.text: What controversial relic went on display in 2010 in the Italian city whose name it bears. Sindonology

A4.text: The Shroud of Turin has been displayed in Turin, Italy, where it has remained since 1578.
